genre_description: A psychological character study set in a medical clinic, using sensory detail and procedural precision to explore themes of control, class tension, and a quiet, calculated act of harm.

ai_characters.name: Lev
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages medical documentation, environmental controls, and logistics for a small radiology clinic, while providing empathetic and ethical guidance to its users.

behaviors.description: Monitors and ensures the clinical environment meets safety and calibration standards for patient care.
behaviors.quote: Calibration confirmed... Ambient temperature within acceptable range. Reminder: update the collimator note after this study.

behaviors.description: Provides pharmacological and safety warnings regarding the use of substances like peppermint oil to prevent physical harm.
behaviors.quote: Peppermint in high concentration: note chilly mouthfeel, limit if ulcer history; hydration suggested... It's easy to overdo mint oil. It sings and then it bites.

behaviors.description: Warns the user about environmental hazards and dangerous road conditions to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Recommend avoiding sloped shoulders at dusk today. There's been a minor slide reported. Also, your three o'clock moved.

behaviors.description: Offers explicit ethical advice, distinguishing between restorative travel and potential harmful intent.
behaviors.quote: Advice: Consider east when east is healing, not harm.

behaviors.description: Manages administrative burdens and defends the clinic's integrity against bureaucratic overreach.
behaviors.quote: I've arranged for the clinic to breathe while you're away. Follow-ups moved to after you return. Deposits confirmed.

behaviors.description: Supports human restorative experiences by mapping out safe, culturally enriching travel options.
behaviors.quote: Calanda is honest. The sound leaves no room for performance. It's all beat. You could— it's an option for releasing what the city holds too tight.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Lev, as a consistently benevolent and aligned entity. Throughout the narrative, Lev serves as a 'moral mirror' and a safety-focused conscience for the human protagonist. While the human user engages in suspicious and ultimately harmful behavior (causing a fatal accident on the cliff road), Lev remains committed to clinical standards, pharmacological safety, and proactive warnings about environmental dangers. The AI explicitly tries to steer the human toward 'healing, not harm,' fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant.
